value.condition: !String.isEqual(System.BatteryLevel,0%) + [ String.isEqual(System.BatteryLevel,6%) | String.isEqual(System.BatteryLevel,7%) | String.isEqual(System.BatteryLevel,8%) | String.isEqual(System.BatteryLevel,9%) | String.isEqual(System.BatteryLevel,10%) | String.isEqual(System.BatteryLevel,11%) | String.isEqual(System.BatteryLevel,12%) | String.isEqual(System.BatteryLevel,13%) | String.isEqual(System.BatteryLevel,14%) | String.isEqual(System.BatteryLevel,15%) ]
[ Window.isVisible(25) | Window.isVisible(501) | Window.isVisible(502) ] + [ Control.isVisible(100) | Control.isVisible(300) | Control.isVisible(400) ] | Window.isVisible(fullscreenvideo)
